Entry.JapaneseText: バルカで何があったんだ……？
港を封鎖するってコトは色々考えられるよネ。 反乱があったとか、すごい犯罪があったとか……
Entry.EnglishText: I can think of tons of reasons why they'd blockade the port. Maybe there was a rebellion, or some huge crimewave...

Entry.JapaneseText: あるいは危険分子をバルカに 入れないために、港を封鎖したか……
Entry.EnglishText: Or perhaps they closed off the port to prevent subversive individuals from entering Balka...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、ボクたちのコトに 勘付いて……？
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be that they've caught on to us...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、それなら、手配書が 出回っていてもおかしくない。
Entry.EnglishText: No. If that were the case, then you would assume they would have put up some wanted posters.
Entry.Notes: Lit. It would not be wierd for them to put up wanted posters.

Entry.JapaneseText: 連中は俺たちの事など、 歯牙にもかけていない様子だ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...They seem to be paying us no mind.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、ボクたちとは関係ない 何かがあるってコトか……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I guess it has nothing to do with us, then...
